channel.title: Looking For Coder
channel.description:
Hey Guys I Got Big Plans For A Server But Im Not The Best At Server/Forums Coding. So A Small Team Would Help.
If You Can Do All Of The Folowing Below Contact Me. -Make Home Area -Make Bug Free Thieving -Add Teleports -Fix Possible Pking Bugs. (Specs, Spells, etc.) -Change Drop Rate Pretty Easy Stuff But I Dont Have The Time. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Post If You Can Handle The Job. You Get Co Owner On Server And Admin On Forums.
Ok my server idea is basicly a home area (havent decided where). Add training npc's to home area or make a training teleport(s). thieving will be the main income of cash for the players. i want the amount from the stalls low for good economy. lower prices or all items like for example, dscim is 100k, fury is 150k, but the 99 thieving will only give 10k per steal, and a decent time to w8 befor each steal. (Need you to code this).
I really like to mess around with custom items and i want to add alot of them, then make a member/donator shop and put the really good ones in the shop. but of course release dclaws and stuff to the public. we could add to a shop for them too or make certain npc's drop them. im a big fan of pking so it needs to be pretty much bug free. later on after we get some players we can work on other skills like wc, mining, etc.
After People start pilling in (if it goes the way i got it planned) hopefully i can get some donations and definatly buy a VPS.

item.title: Looking For Coder
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

changing item drop rates is only thing i canot do. I can do almost anything else you would ask tho. For ex:
custom items in client: (i have 61 and not all are myn but i did add them and give custom id’s so they would work correctly)
autospawns:
safe area:
shops:
item bonuses:
item equip spot:
item name:
item color: (most of time)
making staff only pk spells: (i have 4 of my own)
Making teleports:
Fix bugs:
Make home: (i have changed myn about 10-15 times over last month)
set objects:
turn objects:
delete objects:
basically most of things you NEED to code a server… lol

Read full topic

Hey Guys I Got Big Plans For A Server But Im Not The Best At Server/Forums Coding. So A Small Team Would Help.

After People start pilling in (if it goes the way i got it planned) hopefully i can get some donations and definatly buy a VPS.
